pages.text: Ender Storage adds new Ender Chests and Ender Tanks to your world, providing a secure and customizable way to store items and fluids. Access your storage from anywhere, even across dimensions!
Ender Chests allow you to store items and access them from any other Ender Chest with the same color code.
Ender Tanks allow you to store fluids and access them from any other Ender Tank with the same color code.
Customization and Security:$(br) - $(l)Change the color code$() by right-clicking the wool pads with dye.$(br) - $(l)Add a diamond$() to the latch for extra security, linking it to your player.
